channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP_SE -- SAP S/4HANA Finance (Advanced Payment Management)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP_SE -- SAP S/4HANA Finance (Advanced Payment Management)

item.title: CVE-2024-37172|2024-07-09T15:16:18.449Z -- sap_se -- sap%20s%2F4hana%20finance%20%28advanced%20payment%20management%29
item.description: SAP S/4HANA Finance (Advanced Payment Management) does not perform necessary authorization check for an authenticated user, resulting in escalation of privileges. As a result, it has a low impact to confidentiality and availability but there is no impact on the integrity.

item.title: CVE-2024-37172|2024-07-09T04:15:22.833Z -- sap_se -- sap%20s%2F4hana%20finance%20%28advanced%20payment%20management%29
item.description: SAP S/4HANA Finance (Advanced Payment Management) does not perform necessary authorization check for an authenticated user, resulting in escalation of privileges. As a result, it has a low impact to confidentiality and availability but there is no impact on the integrity.
